name: Melanie (@a11yMel@front-end.social)
summary:
When I repeatedly am asked “Why accessibility though? What’s the business case?” 

I get cranky (but I’m working on that). 

It’s the law. Why do I have to argue a business case for anyone to *checks notes* not break the law?? 

Yes there is a whole ‘nother aspect where it shouldn’t have had to become a law in the first place but FFS.
